climb-1.name: tullparaju mountain
climb-1.description: Embark on a technical climb, rewarded with awe-inspiring vistas of the surrounding peaks.

climb-2.name: alpamayo mountain
climb-2.description: One of the world's most beautiful peaks, with its challenging ascent and rewarding views.

climb-3.name: pisco mountain
climb-3.description: Introduction to high-altitude climbing and stunning vistas of the Cordillera Blanca.

climb-4.description: The tallest peak in Peru, offering a significant mountaineering experience.

trek-1.name: laguna 69 trek
trek-1.description: A short but rewarding hike, a stunning turquoise glacial lake surrounded by towering peaks.

trek-2.name: huayhuash circuit trek
trek-2.description: Embark on an epic journey through the remote mountain range, known for its beauty and high passes.

trek-3.name: pastoruri glacier trek
trek-3.description: A short but fascinating trek where you can witness the effects of glacial retreat.

trek-4.name: santa cruz trek
trek-4.description: Experience the beauty of Cordillera Blanca. Pristine valleys, glacial lakes, and towering peaks.

your-profile.title: Your Profile
your-profile.text:
You have experience hiking and camping in the mountains, in all conditions.
Previous acclimatization is necessary.

our-philosophy.title: Our Philosophy Profile
our-philosophy.text:
This tried and tested itinerary is informed by decades of mountaineering experience. As with all adventurous activities of this type however, circumstances may arise where we are forced to make alterations, possibly at short notice.

While making every effort to adhere to this published schedule, we kindly ask for your patience if the weather, or other naturally occurring circumstances, intervene.

cost.price-introduction-text: The price listed below is per person.
cost.english-spanish-guides-available-text: This expedition can be led by both English-speaking and Spanish-speaking guides.

info-card.title: join an existing group
info-card.text:
A group is formed with a minimum of 2 participants to ensure the departure on your desired date.
The final price will be determined based on the final group size.
Please note that fixed group departures are subject to availability.
Contact us for more information.

cost.personalized-experience-text: For a more personalized experience, we also provide private tour departures. These can be arranged on any date. Kindly contact us for more information.
